preface.title: Organization of this booklet — stura le dei cmacku
preface.para: This booklet is an introduction to the language Lojban. It is divided into three parts.

Part I gives a general presentation of what the language is, why it exists, and why it should be of interest to you. Part II contains a more formal exposition of the language, consisting of an overview of the language's grammar, and a diagrammed summary of its grammar basics. It may be used in conjunction with, or instead of, the introductory lessons available separately. Part III, finally, contains a few texts in Lojban, with parallel translation and glosses, to allow you to get a feel for how the language works.

The Introduction (formerly the la lojban. mo brochure) was originally written by Athelstan and Bob LeChevalier in 1988, and updated in 1991 and 2001. The Overview was originally written by Bob LeChevalier in 1989, and updated in 1990 and 2001. The Diagrammed Summary was originally written by Nora Tansky LeChevalier and Bob LeChevalier in 1990, and updated in 1992 and 2001. Loglan and Lojban was originally written by John Cowan in 1991. The glosses in Part III were made using the program jbofihe by Richar Curnow. Thanks to Pierre Abbat and Jay Kominek for their suggestions.

note.para: This booklet is published by the Logical Language GroupLogical Language Group, incorporated as a non-profit scientific/educational charity approved by the U.S. Government for tax-deductible donations. We ask that those obtaining our materials by computer register your interest with us by postal or computer mail. We also ask that you consider contributing to The Logical Language Group to help offset our continuing costs in general support of the Lojban community. Any amount you contribute will be helpful; contributor's costs can range from as little as $5 for the introductory teaching materials, to greater amounts for people actively learning or supporting the language.

para.foreignphrase: .i le dei cmacku cu vasru loi cfari terdjuno datni pe la lojban. .i le cmacku cu pagbu lo cimei

.i le 1moi pagbu cu naltcila jai jarco ledu'u ly. mo kau kei .e ledu'u ly. zasti mu'i ma kau kei .e ledu'u tu'a ly. cinri do ki'u ma kau .i le 2moi pagbu cu vasru lo ritlymau velski be ly. be'o no'u lo naltcila velski be le gerna sidbo kujoi lo xracartu torvelski be le jubme gerna .i ka'e pilno le go'i .a le cfari ve ctuca be la lojban. be'o noi ka'e ji'a sepli se cpacu .i le 3 mu'amai moi pagbu cu vasru so'u seltcidu pebau la lojban. ge'u .e lo kansa xe fanva .e lo kansa xe vlafanva mu'i lenu do co'a jimpe ledu'u le bangu cu se sazri ta'i ma kau

ni'o le lidne pagbu cu krasi se finti la .AT,lstan. joi la lojbab. ca la 1988nan. gi'e se ningau ca la 1991nan. .e la 2001nan. .i le naltcila velski cu krasi se finti la lojbab. ca la 1989nan. gi'e se ningau ca la 1990nan. .e la 2001nan. .i le xracartu torvelski cu krasi se finti la noras. tanskis. lecevalier. joi la lojbab. ca la 1990nan. gi'e se ningau ca la 1992nan. .e la 2001nan. .i la me la loglan. joi la lojban. cu krasi se finti la djan. kau,n. ca la 1991nan. .i mi ckire la pier. .abat. .e. la djez. KOminek. lenu ra cu stidi sidju

le dei cmacku cu se gubgau la lojbangirz. noi ba'o ritli binxo lo nalprali ke saske ja ctuca ke dinterdu'a girzu poi le merko turni cu zanru lenu le cteki be le jdini poi se dunda fi le girzu cu jdika .i mi cpedu lenu le cpacu be lemi datni bei xebe'i le skami cu jungau ly. lenu se cinri kei semu'i lenu pelji ja skami mrilu .i mi ji'a cpedu lenu do dunda fi la lojbangirz. mu'i lenu jdikygau lemi ca'o se pleji befo lenu vrici sarji le lojbo cecmu .i ro jdini poi do dunda cu plixau .i le se pleji be le dunda cu merko rupnu li su'e 5 pemu'i tu'a le cfari cilre seltcidu ge'uku bi'o lo zmadu pe lo ca'a cilre ja sarji be le bangu
